author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
Hey all,
I've been trying to set up a new program to get more people into testing the merge.
Would love to steal some people away from the apprenticeship program if you are interested in working on that.
I've started writing up a small outline of the ideas/tasks here: https://hackmd.io/WKpg6SNzQbi1jVKNgrSgWg

author: potuz
content: this program sounds great.. and getting a free beer out of it makes it also delicious.
